EntryName	NCTR2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Natural cytotoxicity triggering receptor 2 (Lymphocyte antigen 95 homolog) (NK cell-activating receptor) (Natural killer cell p44-related protein) (NK-p44) (NKp44) (CD antigen CD336)
GeneName	NCR2 LY95
Length	276
Function	Cytotoxicity-activating receptor that may contribute to the increased efficiency of activated natural killer (NK) cells to mediate tumor cell lysis.
